pullRequest.title: Refactors Cassandra v1 indexing code and fixes some glitches
pullRequest.bodyText:
This change performs more cleanups in preparation of the move to Datastax
Java Driver 4, mostly consolidation in nature:

Fixes bug when drop-down choices were added when span data wasn't indexed
Uses less auto-value by choosing Map.Entry for pair/tuple data
Simplify index state management by giving each indexer a separate cache
Moves index clash test to CassandraSpanConsumerTest
Adds a bunch of comments explaining loop logic of CassandraSpanConsumer

commit.message:
Refactors Cassandra v1 indexing code and fixes some glitches

This change performs more cleanups in preparation of the move to Datastax
Java Driver 4, mostly consolidation in nature:

* Fixes bug when drop-down choices were added when span data wasn't indexed
* Uses less auto-value by choosing Map.Entry for pair/tuple data
* Simplify index state management by giving each indexer a separate cache
* Moves index clash test to CassandraSpanConsumerTest
* Adds a bunch of comments explaining loop logic of CassandraSpanConsumer
